name: Association of Dutch Designers
goal: The Association of Dutch Designers is the professional association for designers and design agencies in the Netherlands. BNO supports designers and design agencies in their professional practice. By investing in public information, regulation, research and education, BNO represents the collective interests of the design community and contributes to improving the design infrastructure in the Netherlands and Europe.
interests: Culture, Culture and media, Digital economy and society
euInitiatives:
- Copyrights and other intellectual property rights
- Collective bargaining and competition law
- Public Procurement
- Innovation
- Creative industry
